live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
54590.summary: Some customers in the Lake Hill area of Saanich are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54590.title: Oct 27 - Saanich (Lake Hill) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
